title: Can I be arrested for pirating books? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on what you mean by “pirating”. Slang terms aren't very precise. Setting up a website to distribute the book is a crime in many countries. Even just distributing through torrent software--even if solely during the download you are trying to pull (torrenting works by making downloaders into distributors); a crime in a few countries. But mostly copyright infringement, even when done online, is just a civil violation.
It is theoretically possible — there is such a thing as “criminal copyright violation”. In general, though, it’s much more likely that you would be sued.
